posts.title: Satanist leader’s attempt to hold Black Mass in Kansas Statehouse sparks chaos and 4 arrests
top_comments:
“When we saw that nobody was doing anything — I guess just in the moment of it — it was like, ‘He’s not supposed to be allowed to do this,’ so we tried to stop him,” she said.

The party of free speech, everybody...
Where’s the don’t tread on me crowd?

The Government of the United States gives to bigotry no sanction, to persecution no assistance. Require only that they who live under its protection should demean themselves as good citizens, in giving it on all occasions their effectual support.

-George Washington


	“We the General Assembly of Virginia… do enact that no man shall be compelled to frequent or support any religious worship, place, or ministry whatsoever, nor shall be enforced, restrained, molested, or burdened in his body or goods, nor shall otherwise suffer on account of his religious opinions or belief.”

-Thomas Jefferson



	“The civil rights of none shall be abridged on account of religious belief or worship.”

-James Madison
They should have all worn Tesla logos. Then anyone attacking them would have been classified as domestic terrorists. : )

They say “chaos” but it was positively uneventful compared to what they apparently expected to happen. It was amazing how much of an overreaction there was to this. (Of course hindsight is 20/20). They had police cars surrounding the capitol. An acquaintance who works in the capitol told me they  had SWAT on every floor and hid all the tables and chairs so they couldn’t be used as weapons. They gave all the state workers administrative leave that day too, so they wouldn’t be caught up in anything downtown.

And yet despite all the worry about mass violence, there were a ton of children amongst the counter protesters, all dressed in their Sunday best.
I love that Satanist’s don’t even believe in Satan. It’s the Christians that do.
*trying to remember if there are any photos or evidence of satanists burning an inverted pentagram in front of a black family's house.

Christians always really struggle to understand that Satanists are a political activist group pointing out the hypocrisy of our government bias towards Christianity, not literal worshipers of Satan. 

It would take less than 5 minutes of googling to understand this. The only ones at that protest who actually believe in Satan are the Christians.
The rational next step is to do a bigger one.

The original permit allowed them into the rotunda and in a horrifying display of religious persecution, legislators stepped in to edit the permit at the last second. The Satanists went ahead with their ceremony and were assaulted.   
I don't understand why the leader was arrested. This is ridiculous.

posts.title: 9-year-old girl dies after a dental procedure involving anesthesia in Vista
top_comments: Had a friend in college go under for sinus surgery. Was allergic to the anesthesia or some shit and died.

After going through ACLS (Advance Cardiac Life Support) as an ICU nurse and going through the code situations with some dental hygienists working at a dental office offering anesthesia for dental work, I would never submit myself or my children to anesthesia at a dental office. They were so lost, had no idea what they were doing, and I cannot believe they were allowed to pass the super code simulation. I had to have some major dental work (failed/injected root canals requiring the entire tooth to be extracted) I stuck with local numbing and dealt with the discomfort during the work, rather than risk my life in their hands.
Anesthesia scares the shit out of me. You can have the perfect anesthesiologist and the perfect surgery and still not wake up from it.
Awful. This is why the UK banned general anaesthesia in dentists in 2002.

There was a case where a patient was coughing while under dental anesthesia so the dentist gave more sedation thinking the anesthesia was too light.

There was gauze in the airway, that's why the patient was coughing.

Patient died.

It's not safe for a dentist to try to administer anesthesia while performing dental work, it's best delegated to a dedicated anesthesia provider.

I think back often to an interview I heard with an anesthesiologist, a very philosophical man who took great pride in his work.  He said that his job was essentially to kill his patients and then bring them back to life.  Anesthesia involves processes that would otherwise cause the body to die, but with him there, was his role to manual manage the functions of the body that would otherwise cease.

It's serious shit.

Just tragic

Her poor family too
This breaks my heart.  Poor girl was probably terrified of going to the dentist. I can't imagine the pain the family is going through.

“At this time, it’s not clear if the dental procedure played a role in her death.”

I think this important piece of information is being glossed over

When my sons needed more invasive dental work and needed to fully go under, they had to first pass a physical exam by their pediatricians, and the procedure was done in an actual HOSPITAL, with a pediatric anesthesia specialist overseeing the surgery and plenty of help immediately hand in case anything went wrong.

No one knows why this person is detained, but that's the basic theme lately
"seeking answers" seems like way too mild a response.

Tomorrow's headline: "Minnesota Officials Detained By ICE".

posts.title: United Airlines Flight Hit by Kite Near Washington DC
top_comments: I'm going to go out on a limb here and say that I don't think this was a smart thing for the kite flyer to do.
What ISN’T hitting airplanes right now? Besides submarines.

There was a kite festival for the cherry blossoms and some idiot must have not felt like fighting the traffic to get over to the Washington Monument… it’s impossible to not know that Gravelly Point is a terrible place to fly a kite.
[United CEO this week.](https://youtu.be/lm8fYf53SMg)
I would have thought the plane hit the kite as opposed to the kite hitting the plane. Also can’t imagine there was much left of the kite to be returned to the kite flyer and family.
Why’s it always DC? I have to fly there soon. I’d rather fly into a nearby state and just drive over
So guess the lesson of the year thus far is don’t fly into DC, right?
I'm pretty sure there was a kite festival in DC this weekend
That’s got to be a really long piece of string.

posts.title: US immigration officials look to expand social media data collection
top_comments:
I was reading a thing about 'misbeliefs Gen X has', and it said my generation was foolish because we believed more in anonymity whereas modern generations put themselves out there fully on the net.

Reminds me of the joke.. Do you know who the greatest hacker in the world is? *Of course not, if you did they wouldn't be the greatest hacker in the world.*

Hey social media CEOs, remember when you were all about free speech? Wanna do something about that and tell the government to take a hike? Or are you gonna tell us that content moderation by a private company is infringing on free speech but the government literally persecuting people for their opinions isn’t?
Friends it is time to kill social media. It's been dying for years but let's all do the right thing and kill it dead.
Get off X. I’m telling ya….
Ah, just like the Chinese Social Credit system.
This is how the OG nokia brick phone makes a comeback.
Couldn’t u just delete ask your apps n take a burner phone
What was that?  Sorry, I can't hear you over the sound of my use of Mastodon instead of Facebook!
Maybe we should all stop using social media until those companies lobby the govt to not collect our data on our behalf.
Backup your phone.  Delete all histories and app.  Then restore when through immigration.  Trump is copying china and russia.

posts.title: Wisconsin appeals court won't stop Musk's $1 million payments to voters after attorney general sues
top_comments:
As if people needed more motivation, beyond making sure Elon doesn't get his way, Crawford winning is the only chance of fixing those gerrymandered congressional lines in Wisconsin.

This is why local elections matter, people. In case it's not clear, it all connects.

The article doesn't really cover it, what is the rationale given for denying an injunction?

Musk already committed the felony by making the offer, are they just overlooking that because... reasons?
This isnt even thinly veiled corruption, this is ranked corruption
Kills me that we can’t hand water bottles to people in line to vote, but this vermin can do this crap.
This is unfucking believable.
I think when one can buy democracy at that point democracy is dead.
What is to stop any lower election from just paying people a hundred bucks to vote out a school board member or sheriff?
Laws just, do not apply to billionaires anymore. He quite literally could shoot someone in the middle of Fifth Avenue and no one would do a thing

18 U.S. Code § 597 - Expenditures to influence voting- 

Whoever makes or offers to make an expenditure to any person, either to vote or withhold his vote, or to vote for or against any candidate; and

Whoever solicits, accepts, or receives any such expenditure in consideration of his vote or the withholding of his vote—

Shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than one year, or both; and if the violation was willful, shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than two years, or both.
My reaction kicked in about a month ago. Arm up...fascism is here.

posts.title: First orbital rocket launched from mainland Europe crashes after takeoff
top_comments:
Leon would call this a "successful test".  Celebrations all around.

“This allowed the company to gather a substantial amount of flight data and experience to apply on future missions,” Isar said in a statement. “After the flight was terminated at T+30 seconds, the launch vehicle fell into the sea in a controlled manner.”

Chance of Germany Succeeding Next Time: Pretty Damn Good

Chance of Germany Consulting or Engaging Musk / USA : ZERO

"Isar Aerospace, which had warned the initial launch could end prematurely, said the test produced extensive data that its team could learn from."

Now hire some experts leaving the US (more rights for employees, yay!), add European precision (well, maybe more pricey than Space X processes/materials?), and this may look pretty good pretty soon.
The juxtaposition between this and the threads about the delayed SpaceX launch are kind of amazing.
My main question after watching that is if not self-destructing and allowing it to blow up on the ground was on purpose.

Question:

Why do so many rockets blow up at launch or mid-flight? It happens quite frequently. Is it so difficult to build a 100% working space rocket, even for those big brain engineers?

no worries

Musk has been trying a lot longer and he still blows up
Looks like guidance/stability issues.  That engine was gimbaling like a motherfucker before it swapped ends and became a lawn dart.
When is attempt number 2?

> First orbital rocket launched from mainland Europe


YAY!


> crashes after takeoff 


oh no
German rocket. Bummer, but at least we Europeans try and make progress in this regard. Now learn from the mistakes and do it again.

posts.title: Most employees at US Institute of Peace mass-fired via late-night email
top_comments: Congressionally created and funded thinktank taken over by ‘Doge’ seeks to prevent and resolve global conflicts.

*...there was a standoff as employees blocked Doge members from entering . Doge staff gained access in part with the help of the Washington police.   A White House spokesperson, Anna Kelly, said in an email Saturday that the institute “has failed to deliver peace..."* 

So, fire the Pentagon for failure to deliver defense on 911. That would be far more appropriate and would save 800 billion bucks rather than a few million.
They're not an executive department. Does OMB write their paychecks? What leverage do they have?
Its illegal, so why does anybody go along with it?

"They have failed to create peace."

Its so childish and stupid.  It's "I don't like your name so I'm shutting you down."  They have no idea what this group does.
What a cowardly way of terminating people.  They are afraid to put a name with a face.

That tracks with this government. I can’t wait to we mass fire the all of the  Americorps. I did the Americorps  program City Year which provided extra support to struggling schools.

 I taught ESL 3rd grade  in MA and all my students were 1st year immigrant students. Some students spoke no english in the beginning of the year and by the end of the year they were near grade level.  some of my students (2nd year english speakers) ended up exceeding grade level requirements.

These programs that cost money do a lot of good for the community and children.
One of my close friends works there.  They do really important work and America is less safe with them gone

I was just at the Hiroshima Peace Park and Memorial Museum. Of the many thoughts that crossed my mind was Trump's first term question to his security briefers - 'Why haven't we used [our tactical nukes] since we have them?'
Isn't this a privately funded nonprofit? Why the fuck is the DC Police invading a nonprofit? It's like invading a food bank. WTF.

They were so lost, had no idea what they were doing, and I cannot believe they were allowed to pass the super code simulation. I had to have some major dental work (failed/injected root canals requiring the entire tooth to be extracted) I stuck with local numbing and dealt with the discomfort during the work, rather than risk my life in their hands.
Anesthesia scares the shit out of me. You can have the perfect anesthesiologist and the perfect surgery and still not wake up from it.
Awful. This is why the UK banned general anaesthesia in dentists in 2002.

There was a case where a patient was coughing while under dental anesthesia so the dentist gave more sedation thinking the anesthesia was too light.

There was gauze in the airway, that's why the patient was coughing.

Patient died.

It's not safe for a dentist to try to administer anesthesia while performing dental work, it's best delegated to a dedicated anesthesia provider.

I think back often to an interview I heard with an anesthesiologist, a very philosophical man who took great pride in his work.  He said that his job was essentially to kill his patients and then bring them back to life.  Anesthesia involves processes that would otherwise cause the body to die, but with him there, was his role to manual manage the functions of the body that would otherwise cease.

It's serious shit.

Just tragic

Her poor family too
This breaks my heart.  Poor girl was probably terrified of going to the dentist. I can't imagine the pain the family is going through.

“At this time, it’s not clear if the dental procedure played a role in her death.”

I think this important piece of information is being glossed over

When my sons needed more invasive dental work and needed to fully go under, they had to first pass a physical exam by their pediatricians, and the procedure was done in an actual HOSPITAL, with a pediatric anesthesia specialist overseeing the surgery and plenty of help immediately hand in case anything went wrong.

posts.title: First orbital rocket launched from mainland Europe crashes after takeoff
top_comments:
Leon would call this a "successful test".  Celebrations all around.

“This allowed the company to gather a substantial amount of flight data and experience to apply on future missions,” Isar said in a statement. “After the flight was terminated at T+30 seconds, the launch vehicle fell into the sea in a controlled manner.”

Chance of Germany Succeeding Next Time: Pretty Damn Good

Chance of Germany Consulting or Engaging Musk / USA : ZERO

"Isar Aerospace, which had warned the initial launch could end prematurely, said the test produced extensive data that its team could learn from."

Now hire some experts leaving the US (more rights for employees, yay!), add European precision (well, maybe more pricey than Space X processes/materials?), and this may look pretty good pretty soon.
The juxtaposition between this and the threads about the delayed SpaceX launch are kind of amazing.
My main question after watching that is if not self-destructing and allowing it to blow up on the ground was on purpose.

Question:

Why do so many rockets blow up at launch or mid-flight? It happens quite frequently. Is it so difficult to build a 100% working space rocket, even for those big brain engineers?

no worries

Musk has been trying a lot longer and he still blows up
Looks like guidance/stability issues.  That engine was gimbaling like a motherfucker before it swapped ends and became a lawn dart.
When is attempt number 2?

> First orbital rocket launched from mainland Europe


YAY!


> crashes after takeoff 


oh no
German rocket. Bummer, but at least we Europeans try and make progress in this regard. Now learn from the mistakes and do it again.

posts.title: Satanist leader’s attempt to hold Black Mass in Kansas Statehouse sparks chaos and 4 arrests
top_comments:
“When we saw that nobody was doing anything — I guess just in the moment of it — it was like, ‘He’s not supposed to be allowed to do this,’ so we tried to stop him,” she said.

The party of free speech, everybody...
Where’s the don’t tread on me crowd?

The Government of the United States gives to bigotry no sanction, to persecution no assistance. Require only that they who live under its protection should demean themselves as good citizens, in giving it on all occasions their effectual support.

-George Washington


	“We the General Assembly of Virginia… do enact that no man shall be compelled to frequent or support any religious worship, place, or ministry whatsoever, nor shall be enforced, restrained, molested, or burdened in his body or goods, nor shall otherwise suffer on account of his religious opinions or belief.”

-Thomas Jefferson



	“The civil rights of none shall be abridged on account of religious belief or worship.”

-James Madison
They should have all worn Tesla logos. Then anyone attacking them would have been classified as domestic terrorists. : )

They say “chaos” but it was positively uneventful compared to what they apparently expected to happen. It was amazing how much of an overreaction there was to this. (Of course hindsight is 20/20). They had police cars surrounding the capitol. An acquaintance who works in the capitol told me they  had SWAT on every floor and hid all the tables and chairs so they couldn’t be used as weapons. They gave all the state workers administrative leave that day too, so they wouldn’t be caught up in anything downtown.

And yet despite all the worry about mass violence, there were a ton of children amongst the counter protesters, all dressed in their Sunday best.
I love that Satanist’s don’t even believe in Satan. It’s the Christians that do.
*trying to remember if there are any photos or evidence of satanists burning an inverted pentagram in front of a black family's house.

Christians always really struggle to understand that Satanists are a political activist group pointing out the hypocrisy of our government bias towards Christianity, not literal worshipers of Satan. 

It would take less than 5 minutes of googling to understand this. The only ones at that protest who actually believe in Satan are the Christians.
The rational next step is to do a bigger one.

The original permit allowed them into the rotunda and in a horrifying display of religious persecution, legislators stepped in to edit the permit at the last second. The Satanists went ahead with their ceremony and were assaulted.   
I don't understand why the leader was arrested. This is ridiculous.

18 U.S. Code § 597 - Expenditures to influence voting- 

Whoever makes or offers to make an expenditure to any person, either to vote or withhold his vote, or to vote for or against any candidate; and

Whoever solicits, accepts, or receives any such expenditure in consideration of his vote or the withholding of his vote—

Shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than one year, or both; and if the violation was willful, shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than two years, or both.
My reaction kicked in about a month ago. Arm up...fascism is here.

That tracks with this government. I can’t wait to we mass fire the all of the  Americorps. I did the Americorps  program City Year which provided extra support to struggling schools.

 I taught ESL 3rd grade  in MA and all my students were 1st year immigrant students. Some students spoke no english in the beginning of the year and by the end of the year they were near grade level.  some of my students (2nd year english speakers) ended up exceeding grade level requirements.

These programs that cost money do a lot of good for the community and children.
